EmailTemplate.name: Invite user - already exists
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to GADM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!IF(Contact.LastName= "", "User", Contact.FirstName + ' '+ Contact.LastName )},
*account* has requested you sign up for the GADM service. Click on *link*, and follow these instructions to request access to the GADM service.
GADM Team gadm@iata.org
